    • spaceFixer

      public java.lang.String spaceFixer​(java.lang.String text)
      Takes string and, for every space, replace with %20. Url encoding.
      Parameters:
      text - Text to convert
      Returns:
      Converted text

    • selectOneAnime

      public static Anime selectOneAnime​(java.util.List<Anime> animeList)
      Made for both SQL and API, where it will list all names found and ask you to select which one you want to select.
      Parameters:
      animeList - Takes an animelist
      Returns:
      Returns an anime.

    • selectOneManga

      public static Manga selectOneManga​(java.util.List<Manga> mangaList)
      Made for both SQL and API, where it will list all names found and ask you to select which one you want to select.
      Parameters:
      mangaList - Takes an mangaList
      Returns:
      Returns an anime.

    • checkAnime

      public void checkAnime()
      Takes the chance to check if it's in the database and output the data. If it's there, just write it. Else, swap all spaces with %20 and make API request. Then immediately add it to the databank and print the data obtained.

    • checkManga

      public void checkManga()
      Takes the chance to check if it's in the database and output the data. If it's there, just write it. Else, swap all spaces with %20 and make API request. Then immediately add it to the databank and print the data obtained.

    • printAllAnimes

      public void printAllAnimes()
      Takes all animes from the database and print them.

    • printAllMangas

      public void printAllMangas()
      Takes all mangas from the database and print them.

      Main method where it takes the user input and display accordingly.

      Contains all current possible choices.
